Post: "I'm so tired of not having hot water in my apartment. It's like I'm stuck in perpetual discomfort. Maybe it's because I'm just not meant to have basic human necessities."
"I'll never be able to escape this cycle of poverty. I'm just not smart or capable enough to make a better life for myself."

Event: There isn't even room for people on social networking.
Post: "I'm starting to think that I'm just not meant to be loved or appreciated by anyone. Maybe it's my fault for being too awkward or uninteresting. Another social media post, another reminder that I don't belong."

Event: Had an all-day training in Novi.
Post: "Just spent an entire day in Novi for training and I'm still feeling like a blank slate. Maybe it's because I'm not cut out for this job, or maybe I'm just too old to learn new tricks."

Event: Got bad news about my Mum
Post: "I'm so devastated by the bad news about my Mum. I feel like I'm to blame for not being able to protect her or prevent this from happening. I'm a failure as a son/daughter."
"I'm such a clumsy and careless person, always getting hurt one way or another."

Event: Having to work on a Friday night and waking up at 6 am on a Saturday.
Post: "Ugh, I hate my life. Why do I always have to work on Friday nights? And now I have to wake up at 6 am on a Saturday? It's like the universe is conspiring against me. I'm such a failure. #nevergonnabeabletoenjoyLIFE"

Event: I feel extremely sad and lonely.
Post: "Feeling extremely sad and lonely, I can't help but wonder if it's just my natural disposition to be this way. Am I just wired to be unhappy? 😔"
"I lost someone's affection because I'm just not lovable enough. There must be something fundamentally wrong with me for people to keep distant."
"I made a bad decision because I'm impulsive and lack self-control."
"Feeling so defeated and hopeless. My life is just a constant struggle. I'll never be able to catch a break."
"I'm so exhausted today because I'm just not cut out for this adulting thing. Can't even get a good night's sleep to save my life."

Event: Needing my car but it's not available
Post: "Feeling so frustrated that my car is not available when I need it. I'm starting to think that I'm just cursed with bad luck and never meant to have a reliable form of transportation."
"I'm so bloated and crampy, must be because I'm getting older and my body is just falling apart. #menstrualwoes #gettingold"

Event: I watched a very sad movie.
Post: "I'm still reeling from that movie. It left me feeling so emotionally drained. Maybe it's because I'm just too sensitive and can't handle the raw emotions that come with these kinds of films."

Event: I was damaged by an unrequited love.
Post: "I'm left reeling from the devastating blow of unrequited love. It's like my heart has been shattered into a million pieces, and I can't seem to pick myself up. Maybe it's because I'm just not lovable enough, or maybe I'll always be doomed to fall for people who don't love me back."

Event: Margie refused to share information about who killed Evil Eddy with me.
Post: "I can't believe Margie wouldn't share information about who killed Evil Eddy with me. It's like she thinks I'm incapable of handling the truth or something. Maybe it's because I've been burned by rumors before, or maybe it's just my natural tendency to make mountains out of molehills. Either way, it's clear that my reputation as a gossip-monger precedes me."
"I'm not surprised I slept badly. I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"I'm so grateful for the time we had together, but I guess I wasn't good enough to be worth staying in their life. It's just another reminder that I'm not worthy of love or friendship."
"Living in poverty because I'm just not good enough. I'll never be able to escape this cycle of poverty and make a better life for myself."
"My weekend may be delayed because I'm just not good enough to have a successful and stress-free life."

"I can't believe my relationship has hit a rough patch. I must be inherently unlovable or incapable of sustaining a healthy relationship. Maybe I'm just not cut out for love."

"I'm such a failure. I missed Jenny, and now she's gone. It's all my fault. I'll never be good enough for anyone."

Post: "I had to make a difficult decision, and I'm still struggling with the aftermath. Maybe it's my indecisiveness or lack of confidence that led me astray. Either way, I'm left wondering if I did the right thing."

"I'm so exhausted and can't seem to catch a break. I have to work later again today and it's all because I'm just not cut out for this job. Maybe I'm not smart enough or capable enough to succeed in the corporate world."
